values: even tho...i am grounded for almost the rest of my life....until im 17.....jeez....ok....i really have like 3 months, 2 weeks, and 4 days left...omg...this really sux!! but ne waze...things are kinda lookin up for me....i swear it doesnt even seem as if i am grounded....because my dad lets me go out with my friends...lets them come over...but...i cant talk on the phone...or the internet....oo yea...and i might get to keep my car...idk.....it seems like it...because its still in driveway..and i still have the keys....hahaha....hmm..idk....ne waze...the new year is gonna be pretty good! i get to start over...i just wish that my past mistakes could be erased....well...some of them...not all of them..because i learn a lot of lessons from my mistakes....so...yea...welll...to whomever is goin to the party tonight....ill see ya there ok..i love you guys!! muah!!

why when everything seems to be as perfect as it can be... expecially when christmas is coming up... and having the most wonderful boi friend that i can ever ask for.... how come it all turns out to be the same in the end.... you feeling like shit because he breaks up with you.... and u feel as if you are just the ugliest person in the world... and no one likes you... and u feel as if u wanna die... and he tell you... it isnt you.... its me...that just makes it worse... most of u guys knew how happy i was with Justin....expecially you dez! we were talking about his after school yesterday.... i must have jinxed it or seomthing because he broke up with me last night... because he feels as if he is restricted to having a certain amount of fun....the one guy that i felt so much for.... the one guy that i gave up everything for.... the one guy that i waited for, for so long...doesnt feel the same way as i do about him....it is the worst feeling in the world to be rejected... or dumped...i went to work today... and ill i was able to concentrate on was Justin.... i cant at all think staright... and i have no one that i could talk to that woudl avhually understand me.... this is really gonna be the worst christmas ever for me! if i had Justin... i would be ever so exstatic...now i feel like shit

mom woke me up at 6 oclock in the morning! i was so tired! i didnt sleep good at all last night, i woke up and my back was killing me, i had to take care of the baby, then make Cindi's lunch for school, then iron her stuff for school, i swear i still was not awke when doing all this! it was kinda dangerous! then i went back to sleep, she woke me up again to take my bro out of his room to play with him! yawn! im tired! i dont remember what happened after that! ummm, danny made me breakfast then i got up and got ready, i picked up my registration packet, i saw ryan hathcock! omg! i cant beleive i went out with him! jeez! what is wrong with me? ummm i dont really remember much of today, but i do remember talking to fernando and dez while cooking dinner tonight! ohh guys-it achually turned out delicious! mom and cindi liked it! yesterday was probably one of the most emotional days of my life! once again i had my mother yelling at me telling me that i was a peice of crap, i was fighting all day with lori as always but it got alot worse, my dad told me i hope you dont even get the job, danny and mom were at eachothers throats, daniel screenming now in a good mood the whole day, i wasnt really in the mood for talking to my "friend", i have now clue why, mabey it was because that after all that with my family, i figured even if i talked to my "freind" that still wouldnt help, i just wanted to be alone, and to not talk to anyone! but im sorry if i was a jerk to anyone yesterday! or if i ignored you! i was not a nice person at all yesterday! and im sorry! and dez, im really happy that u didnt have to see what i went thru yesterday with my parents, and my sister, if any one achually saw that, mabey, just mabey you guys would understand why i try alot harder than any of my other sisters, because i knoe that im not going to make the same mistakes as them! i really hope that i can do this, and face my family for just 2 more years. sometimes i want a new family-thats when i just go to dez's house, but other times they can achually be a family! and help eachother, i just wish that ill get my socail security #, then ill get my job at Stater Brothers, then ill get my license, and i wish that my family wont be jerks to me n e more, and not make me feel really bad about myself, like yesterday! i really felt like crap! i felt like, what if i died? who would care? what would it be like without me? once people found out, who would care? what is life about, when everyday u have a new challenge, new things go wrong all the time, like yesterday! then i realized if u didnt suffer then u would never learn to appreciate thing in life! and its all happening to you to make u whole, and mature, and God is doing this because when you go thru hard time like that yesterday, he wants u to come to him, and ask him to solve your problems, but i dint do that yesterday! i was lost! i was confused! it hurt to feel ne thing for anyone! that happened because i didnt go to God! if i did, none of that would have happened! i knoe that now!

im tired! dez woke me up this morning to get ready at 5!!!! wow! ohh man! that is so early! we got to Staters at 6 or so, and waited outside in the cold weather, until 8 then they finally gave us our applications! then we filled them out, and they called us in 8 people at a time in numerical order. i was #13, it took them forver to get to me and dez! haha! they were finally calling us in, and dez had went to the restroom to go brush her teeth from eating a doughut! omg! i swear if i didnt have my cell phone with me today, i dont think i would have found her! i called her and i told her where to go, and she met me there. that would have been really sad if she couldnt find me! the interview finally came, i was kinda scared, but then confident. i just told them everything they asked. first jesse (manager-the guy that interview me) he asked if a had a social security #! jesse already knoes the situation to, so i told him, i applied for it yesterday, if i get hired, i will have it by the time i start working! he said thats fine. then he asked why i wanted to work for Stater Brothers! i said what i put on my application! i just want to be apart of the Stater Brothers family! and i want to be responsible on my own by having a job, and not depending on my parents. ohh boy! i wanna go back to sleep now! i missed out on like 3 or 4 hours of sleep today! jeez! i probably wont get the job tho, because of the whole social security thing, but thats ok, i can just go again in 4 months! i dont want to, but i will if thats how everything is going to turn out!
